00030 using namespace std;
00031 
00032 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) 
00033 {
00034         
00035         cout << "Welcome to Fill Event" << endl;
00036         TString inFile = argv[1];
00037         TString outFile = argv[2];
00038         
00039         EdwDSWriter mOutput(outFile.Data(),"HLaMC","recreate");
00040         EdwHLaMCEvent *mEv = dynamic_cast<EdwHLaMCEvent*>(mOutput.GetEvent());
00041         
00042         ifstream input;
00043         input.open(inFile,ios::in);
00044         if (!input.is_open()) {cout << "Could not open" << inFile << endl;}
00045         
00046         Int_t mEventID;
00047         Int_t mNumHits;
00048         Int_t mTrackID;
00049         Int_t mParentID;
00050         Double_t mTime;
00051         string mParticleName;
00052         string mProcess;
00053         string mCreationProcess;
00054         Double_t mEnergy;
00055         string mVolume;
00056         Double_t mXpos;
00057         Double_t mYpos;
00058         Double_t mZpos;
00059         
00060         while(!input.eof())
00061 {
00062                 
00063                 mEv->Clear("C"); //clear the event at the beginning, just to be sure. 
00064                 /*
00065                 if((i % 2000) == 0) 
00066                         cout << i << " events filled" << endl;
00067                 mEv->SetRunNumber(12);
00068                 //mEv->SetDataCleaningWord(4);
00069                 */
00070                 //read input stream and get mNumHits
00071                 input >> mEventID >> mNumHits >> mTrackID >> mParentID >> mTime >> mParticleName >> mProcess >> mCreationProcess >> mEnergy >> mVolume >> mXpos >> mYpos >> mZpos;
00072                 
00073                 //fill the bolo with all hits of one event
00074                 for(Int_t i = 0; i < mNumHits; i++) {
00075                         EdwMCSingleBoloSubRecord* mBolo = mEv->AddBolo();
00076                         mBolo->SetEventID(mEventID);
00077                         mBolo->SetNumHits(mNumHits);
00078                         mBolo->SetTrackID(mTrackID);
00079                         mBolo->SetParentID(mParentID);
00080                         mBolo->SetTime(mTime);
00081                         mBolo->SetParticleName(mParticleName.c_str(), mParticleName.length());
00082                         mBolo->SetProcess(mProcess.c_str(), mProcess.length());
00083                         mBolo->SetCreationProcess(mCreationProcess.c_str(), mCreationProcess.length());
00084                         mBolo->SetEnergyRecoil(mEnergy);
00085                         mBolo->SetDetectorName(mVolume.c_str(), mVolume.length());
00086                         mBolo->SetXpos(mXpos);
00087                         mBolo->SetYpos(mYpos);
00088                         mBolo->SetZpos(mZpos);
00089                         
00090                         if (i < mNumHits) {
00091                                 input >> mEventID >> mNumHits >> mTrackID >> mParentID >> mTime >> mParticleName >> mProcess >> mCreationProcess >> mEnergy >> mVolume >> mXpos >> mYpos >> mZpos;
00092                         }
00093                 }
00094                 
00095                 
00096                 /*
00097                 if(i == 1){
00098                         gObjectTable->Print();
00099                 }
00100                 
00101                 if(i == 10000000)
00102                         gObjectTable->Print();
00103                 
00104                 if(i == 14000000)
00105                         gObjectTable->Print();
00106                 */
00107                 
00108                 
00109                  mOutput.Fill();
00110                  
00111         }
00112 
00113         cout << "Done filling events." << endl;
00114         //gObjectTable->Print();
00115         mOutput.Write();
00116         
00117         input.close();
00118         
00119         cout << "Write Tree" << endl;
00120         //gObjectTable->Print();
00121         mOutput.Close();
00122         cout << "Closing File" << endl;
00123         //gObjectTable->Print();
00124         //delete mEv;
00125         //EdwEventFactory::DeleteEvent(mEv);
00126                 
00127         //cout << "Clean up EdwHLAEvent object " << endl;
00128 
00129         //gObjectTable->Print();
00130 }
